org.csstudio.platform.internal.model.pvs
Class AbstractProcessVariableNameParser

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.internal.model.pvs.AbstractProcessVariableNameParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
DalNameParser, SimpleNameParser
public abstract class AbstractProcessVariableNameParser
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for name parsers which parse process variable addresses from Strings.

Author:
Sven Wende
